mainEntity.name: What are the first steps after water damage occurs?

acceptedAnswer.text: 1. Shut off water source 2. Turn off electricity in affected areas 3. Document damage with photos 4. Call First To Respond at 818-462-7299 for 24/7 emergency water extraction. Our average response time is 60 minutes in San Fernando Valley.

mainEntity.name: How long does professional drying take?

acceptedAnswer.text: Typical drying times with industrial equipment: • Hardwood floors: 5-7 days • Drywall: 3-5 days • Concrete: 2-4 days. We use moisture meters to verify complete dryness before closing each case.

mainEntity.name: Can water damage cause hidden health issues?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Within 48 hours, undried moisture can cause: • Mold growth • Bacteria proliferation • Structural weakening. Our post-extraction antimicrobial treatment prevents these risks (included in all water damage services).
